definitions.definition: The study of art or beauty .
That which appeals to the senses .
The set of artistic motifs defining a collection of things, especially works of art ; more broadly, their aura or “ vibe ”.
examples: Her most recent works have this quirky, nonchalant ’90s teen culture–inspired aesthetic .
I really like the goth aesthetic you've got going there.

main_definition: The study of art or beauty .
secondary_definitions: That which appeals to the senses .
The set of artistic motifs defining a collection of things, especially works of art ; more broadly, their aura or “ vibe ”.
